articles.title: Meta freezes AI hiring after $14B spending spree and costly talent poaching: Is the AI bubble bursting?
articles.summary: Meta has slammed the brakes on hiring for its artificial intelligence division, a sudden pause that follows one of the most expensive talent grabs Silicon Valley has seen in years. The move, first reported by The Wall Street Journal, marks the end of a spending spree in which the company acquired more than 50 high-profile AI researchers and

articles.title: Meta Freezes AI Hiring as Surging Costs Raise Concerns, Report Says
articles.summary: Meta Platforms reportedly has frozen hiring in its high-profile artificial intelligence division as investors grow concerned about the unit's surging costs.
articles.translated_title: Meta Freezes AI Hiring as Surging Costs Raise Concerns, Report Says

articles.title: Google Is Trying Everything to Sell AI to Skeptics
articles.summary: The launch of new Pixel devices featured a long lineup of celebrities and influencers paid to make the case for artificial intelligence.
articles.translated_title: Google Is Trying Everything to Sell AI to Skeptics
articles.translated_summary: The launch of new Pixel devices featured a long lineup of celebrities and influencers paid to make the case for artificial intelligence.

articles.title: Warren Brodey, 101, dies; a visionary at the dawn of the Information Age
articles.summary: Warren Brodey, who used his background as a psychiatrist to develop wide-ranging ideas about the liberating possibilities of technology at the dawn of the information age -- ideas that helped lay the groundwork for revolutionary fields like artificial intelligence -- died on Aug. 10 at his home in Oslo, Norway. He was 101.

articles.title: Hundreds Of Microsoft Employees Just Revealed Their Pay - From $111K To $340K - As Company Fights To Keep AI Talent From Meta
articles.summary: Microsoft Corp. employees leak compensation details through an anonymous spreadsheet as company battles Meta Platforms Inc. for artificial intelligence talent with multi-million dollar offers.

articles.title: Chinese startup DeepSeek releases upgraded AI model
articles.summary: Chinese artificial intelligence startup DeepSeek on Thursday released DeepSeek-V3.1, an upgraded model with hybrid inference structure, faster thinking speed and stronger agent capability, the company said in a statement published on WeChat.
articles.translated_title: Chinese startup DeepSeek releases upgraded AI model
articles.translated_summary: Chinese artificial intelligence startup DeepSeek on Thursday released DeepSeek-V3.1, an upgraded model with hybrid inference structure, faster thinking speed and stronger agent capability, the company said in a statement published on WeChat.

articles.title: Chinese AI startup DeepSeek releases upgraded model with domestic chip support
articles.summary: Chinese artificial intelligence startup DeepSeek released on Thursday an upgrade to its flagship V3 model that the company says has a feature that can optimize it for Chinese-made chips, along with faster processing speeds.
articles.translated_title: Chinese AI startup DeepSeek releases upgraded model with domestic chip support
articles.translated_summary: Chinese artificial intelligence startup DeepSeek released on Thursday an upgrade to its flagship V3 model that the company says has a feature that can optimize it for Chinese-made chips, along with faster processing speeds.

articles.title: Mark Zuckerberg Halts AI Hiring After Million-Dollar Talent Poaching Sparks Investor Backlash Amid Meta's 'Superintelligence Efforts:' Report
articles.summary: Meta Platforms Inc. has implemented a hiring freeze in its artificial intelligence division following months of aggressive recruitment.

articles.title: Commonwealth Bank of Australia Reverses Job Cuts Decision Over AI Chatbots
articles.summary: Commonwealth Bank of Australia reversed a decision to cut 45 customer service roles due to new artificial intelligence technology after pressure from the country’s main financial services union.
